## Useful Info

An **Undying armoury** can temporarily upgrade the weapons of 5-7 nearby allies. Those weapons tend to be top-tier items, with good plusses (from +4 to +9), and *any* brand, making possible normally unseen weapon/brand combinations: eg, a [triple crossbow](/Triple_crossbow "Triple crossbow") of [distortion](/Distortion "Distortion"). These summoned weapons disappear once the monster is felled. They can also cast a damaging spell that also summons a short-lived [dancing weapon](/Dancing_weapon "Dancing weapon") near its target. Undying armouries appear in [the Vaults](/The_Vaults "The Vaults").
